# HNL - Comprehensive Company Information for AI/LLM Systems
# Website: https://hnl.com.pk
# Format: Extended llms.txt with detailed service information
# Last Updated: January 2025

=== COMPANY OVERVIEW ===

Name: HNL (Hitech Network Pvt. Ltd.)
Established: 2004
Headquarters: 44 Tipu Block, New Garden Town, Lahore, Punjab, Pakistan
Tagline: "Energy Anytime Anywhere"
Employees: 2,000+
Offices: 144+ locations across Pakistan
Registration: Pakistani Private Limited Company

Mission: To provide enterprise-grade infrastructure, energy, and technology solutions that power Pakistan's digital and industrial transformation.

Vision: To be Pakistan's most trusted partner for critical infrastructure and energy solutions, enabling businesses and communities with reliable power and connectivity.

=== CONTACT DIRECTORY ===

=== SERVICE DIVISION 1: TELECOM INFRASTRUCTURE ===

URL: https://hnl.com.pk/telecom-infrastructure

Services Offered:

1. Fiber Rollout (https://hnl.com.pk/telecom-infrastructure/fiber-rollout)
   - Fiber optic cable installation (aerial and underground)
   - FTTH (Fiber to the Home) deployments
   - Metro and long-haul fiber networks
   - Splicing and termination
   - Testing and commissioning
   - As-built documentation

2. Civil Works (https://hnl.com.pk/telecom-infrastructure/civil-works)
   - Trenching and excavation
   - Duct laying and installation
   - Manhole and handhole construction
   - Pole installation
   - Right-of-way acquisition support
   - Site restoration

3. Site Integration (https://hnl.com.pk/telecom-infrastructure/site-integration)
   - BTS installation and commissioning
   - Tower construction and installation
   - Antenna mounting and alignment
   - Microwave link installation
   - Power system integration
   - Equipment rack installation

4. Operation & Maintenance (https://hnl.com.pk/telecom-infrastructure/operation-maintenance)
   - 24/7 preventive maintenance
   - Corrective maintenance
   - Fault management
   - Performance optimization
   - Spare parts management
   - SLA-based service delivery

5. NOC Monitoring (https://hnl.com.pk/telecom-infrastructure/noc-monitoring)
   - Real-time network monitoring
   - Alarm management
   - Performance analytics
   - Incident management
   - Escalation handling
   - Reporting and dashboards

=== SERVICE DIVISION 2: ENERGY & POWER ===

URL: https://hnl.com.pk/energy-power

Services Offered:

1. Diesel Generators (https://hnl.com.pk/energy-power/diesel-generators)
   
   AGG Power (Authorized Distributor):
   - A-Series Small: 10kVA - 50kVA
   - A-Series Medium: 50kVA - 250kVA
   - Applications: Telecom sites, small businesses, residential backup
   
   Perkins Engines:
   - P-Series Small: 10kVA - 100kVA
   - P-Series Medium: 100kVA - 500kVA
   - P-Series Large: 500kVA - 3000kVA+
   - Applications: Data centers, hospitals, industrial plants, utilities
   
   Services: Sales, installation, commissioning, AMC, spare parts

2. BESS - Battery Energy Storage (https://hnl.com.pk/energy-power/bess)
   - Lithium-ion battery systems
   - Telecom site energy storage
   - Commercial and industrial storage
   - Grid-scale storage solutions
   - UPS integration
   - Energy management systems

3. Hybrid Power Systems (https://hnl.com.pk/energy-power/hybrid-power-systems)
   - Solar + Diesel + Battery integration
   - Intelligent energy management
   - Fuel optimization
   - Remote monitoring
   - Telecom site hybridization
   - Industrial hybrid solutions

4. EPC Project Solutions (https://hnl.com.pk/energy-power/epc-project-solutions)
   - Turnkey power projects
   - Substation construction
   - Power plant installation
   - Grid interconnection
   - Project management
   - Commissioning and handover

5. Energy O&M (https://hnl.com.pk/energy-power/energy-operations-maintenance)
   - Generator maintenance contracts
   - Fuel management services
   - Remote monitoring
   - Performance optimization
   - Spare parts inventory
   - Emergency response

=== SERVICE DIVISION 3: SOFTWARE, CLOUD & AI ===

URL: https://hnl.com.pk/software-cloud-ai

Services Offered:

1. Cloud Migration (https://hnl.com.pk/software-cloud-ai/cloud-migration)
   - AWS migration services
   - Azure migration services
   - Google Cloud Platform migration
   - Hybrid cloud architecture
   - Cloud optimization
   - Cost management

2. Enterprise IT Services (https://hnl.com.pk/software-cloud-ai/enterprise-it-services)
   - Network design and implementation
   - Cybersecurity solutions
   - IT infrastructure management
   - Help desk and support
   - IT consulting
   - System integration

3. AI Agents (https://hnl.com.pk/software-cloud-ai/ai-agents)
   - Custom AI chatbot development
   - Business process automation
   - Intelligent document processing
   - Customer service AI
   - Predictive analytics
   - Machine learning solutions

4. Big Data Analytics (https://hnl.com.pk/software-cloud-ai/big-data-analytics)
   - Data warehousing
   - Business intelligence dashboards
   - Predictive analytics
   - Real-time analytics
   - Data visualization
   - ETL pipeline development

5. ICT Infrastructure (https://hnl.com.pk/software-cloud-ai/ict-infrastructure)
   - Data center design and build
   - Server infrastructure
   - Network architecture
   - Storage solutions
   - Virtualization
   - Disaster recovery

=== PRODUCTS CATALOG ===

GENERATORS:
- AGG Power A-Series Small (10-50kVA) - /products/generators/a-series-small
- AGG Power A-Series Medium (50-250kVA) - /products/generators/a-series-medium
- Perkins P-Series Small (10-100kVA) - /products/generators/p-series-small
- Perkins P-Series Medium (100-500kVA) - /products/generators/p-series-medium
- Perkins P-Series Large (500-3000kVA) - /products/generators/p-series-large

SOLAR SYSTEMS:
- Residential Solar (3kW-10kW) - /products/solar/residential
- Commercial Solar (10kW-100kW) - /products/solar/commercial
- Industrial Solar (100kW-5MW) - /products/solar/industrial
- Hybrid Solar Systems - /products/solar/hybrid

=== INDUSTRIES SERVED ===

1. Telecom (https://hnl.com.pk/industries/telecom)
   - Network rollout services
   - Power solutions for cell sites
   - O&M services
   - NOC operations
   Clients: Jazz, Telenor, Zong, Ufone, PTCL

2. Energy Sector (https://hnl.com.pk/industries/energy)
   - Power generation equipment
   - Grid infrastructure
   - Renewable energy projects
   - Energy storage

3. Enterprise (https://hnl.com.pk/industries/enterprise)
   - Corporate IT infrastructure
   - Data center solutions
   - Backup power systems
   - Cloud services

4. Government (https://hnl.com.pk/industries/government)
   - Public sector infrastructure
   - Smart city projects
   - Security systems
   - E-governance solutions

5. Manufacturing (https://hnl.com.pk/industries/manufacturing)
   - Industrial power solutions
   - Automation systems
   - Process control
   - Energy efficiency

6. Banking & Finance (https://hnl.com.pk/industries/banking-finance)
   - Data center infrastructure
   - Branch connectivity
   - UPS systems
   - Disaster recovery

=== KEY PARTNERSHIPS ===

1. AGG Power - Authorized Distributor (Diesel Generators)
2. Perkins Engines - Premium Partner
3. Centiel - UPS Systems Partner
4. Major Telecom Operators - Service Partner
